verses.verse: The word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> that came <S%H1961><s%> to Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> concerning <S%H1697><s%> the dearth. <S%H1226><s%>

Judah <S%H3063><s%> mourns, <S%H56><s%> and the gates <S%H8179><s%> thereof languish; <S%H535><s%> they are black <S%H6937><s%> to the ground; <S%H776><s%> and the cry <S%H6682><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> is gone <S%H5927><s%> up.

And their nobles <S%H117><s%> have sent <S%H7971><s%> their little <S%H6810><s%> ones to the waters: <S%H4325><s%> they came <S%H935><s%> to the pits, <S%H1356><s%> and found <S%H4672><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> water; <S%H4325><s%> they returned <S%H7725><s%> with their vessels <S%H3627><s%> empty; <S%H7387><s%> they were ashamed <S%H954><s%> and confounded, <S%H3637><s%> and covered <S%H2645><s%> their heads. <S%H7218><s%>

Because <S%H5668><s%> the ground <S%H127><s%> is beat down, <S%H2865><s%> for there was no <S%H3808><s%> rain <S%H1653><s%> in the earth, <S%H776><s%> the plowmen <S%H406><s%> were ashamed, <S%H954><s%> they covered <S%H2645><s%> their heads. <S%H7218><s%>

Yes, <S%H3588><s%> <S%H1571><s%> the hind <S%H365><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> calved <S%H3205><s%> in the field, <S%H7704><s%> and forsook <S%H5800><s%> it, because <S%H3588><s%> there was no <S%H3808><s%> grass. <S%H1758><s%>

And the wild <S%H6501><s%> asses <S%H6501><s%> did stand <S%H5975><s%> in the high <S%H8205><s%> places, they snuffed <S%H7602><s%> up the wind <S%H7307><s%> like dragons; <S%H8577><s%> their eyes <S%H5869><s%> did fail, <S%H3615><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> there was no <S%H369><s%> grass. <S%H6212><s%>

O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> though <S%H518><s%> our iniquities <S%H5771><s%> testify <S%H6030><s%> against us, do <S%H6213><s%> you it for your name's <S%H8034><s%> sake: <S%H4616><s%> for our backslidings <S%H4878><s%> are many; <S%H7231><s%> we have sinned <S%H2398><s%> against you.

O the hope <S%H4723><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> the savior <S%H3467><s%> thereof in time <S%H6256><s%> of trouble, <S%H6869><s%> why <S%H4100><s%> should you be as a stranger <S%H1616><s%> in the land, <S%H776><s%> and as a wayfaring <S%H732><s%> man that turns <S%H5186><s%> aside <S%H5186><s%> to tarry <S%H3885><s%> for a night?

Why <S%H4100><s%> should you be as a man <S%H376><s%> astonished, <S%H1724><s%> as a mighty <S%H1368><s%> man <S%H376><s%> that cannot <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3201><s%> save? <S%H3467><s%> yet you, O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> are in the middle <S%H7130><s%> of us, and we are called <S%H7121><s%> by your name; <S%H8034><s%> leave <S%H5117><s%> us not.

Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> to this <S%H2088><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> Thus <S%H3651><s%> have they loved <S%H157><s%> to wander, <S%H5128><s%> they have not refrained <S%H2820><s%> their feet, <S%H7272><s%> therefore the LORD <S%H3068><s%> does not accept <S%H7521><s%> them; he will now <S%H4994><s%> remember <S%H2142><s%> their iniquity, <S%H5771><s%> and visit <S%H6485><s%> their sins. <S%H2403><s%>
Then said <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> to me, Pray <S%H6419><s%> not for this <S%H2088><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> for their good. <S%H2896><s%>

When <S%H3588><s%> they fast, <S%H6684><s%> I will not hear <S%H8085><s%> their cry; <S%H7440><s%> and when <S%H3588><s%> they offer <S%H5927><s%> burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering and an oblation, <S%H4503><s%> I will not accept <S%H7521><s%> them: but I will consume <S%H3615><s%> them by the sword, <S%H2719><s%> and by the famine, <S%H7458><s%> and by the pestilence. <S%H1698><s%>

Then said <S%H559><s%> I, Ah, <S%H162><s%> Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD! <S%H3069><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> the prophets <S%H5030><s%> say <S%H559><s%> to them, You shall not see <S%H7200><s%> the sword, <S%H2719><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall you have famine; <S%H7458><s%> but I will give <S%H5414><s%> you assured <S%H571><s%> peace <S%H7965><s%> in this <S%H2088><s%> place. <S%H4725><s%>

Then the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to me, The prophets <S%H5030><s%> prophesy <S%H5012><s%> lies <S%H8267><s%> in my name: <S%H8034><s%> I sent <S%H7971><s%> them not, neither <S%H3808><s%> have I commanded <S%H6680><s%> them, neither <S%H3808><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to them: they prophesy <S%H5012><s%> to you a false <S%H8267><s%> vision <S%H2377><s%> and divination, <S%H7081><s%> and a thing of nothing, <S%H434><s%> and the deceit <S%H8649><s%> of their heart. <S%H3820><s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> concerning <S%H5921><s%> the prophets <S%H5030><s%> that prophesy <S%H5012><s%> in my name, <S%H8034><s%> and I sent <S%H7971><s%> them not, yet they say, <S%H559><s%> Sword <S%H2719><s%> and famine <S%H7458><s%> shall not be in this <S%H2063><s%> land; <S%H776><s%> By sword <S%H2719><s%> and famine <S%H7458><s%> shall those <S%H1992><s%> prophets <S%H5030><s%> be consumed. <S%H8552><s%>

And the people <S%H5971><s%> to whom <S%H834><s%> <S%H1992><s%> they prophesy <S%H5012><s%> shall be cast <S%H7993><s%> out in the streets <S%H2351><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of the famine <S%H7458><s%> and the sword; <S%H2719><s%> and they shall have none <S%H369><s%> to bury <S%H6912><s%> them, them, their wives, <S%H802><s%> nor their sons, <S%H1121><s%> nor their daughters: <S%H1323><s%> for I will pour <S%H8210><s%> their wickedness <S%H7451><s%> on them.

Therefore you shall say <S%H559><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> word <S%H1697><s%> to them; Let my eyes <S%H5869><s%> run <S%H3381><s%> down with tears <S%H1832><s%> night <S%H3915><s%> and day, <S%H3119><s%> and let them not cease: <S%H1820><s%> for the virgin <S%H1330><s%> daughter <S%H1323><s%> of my people <S%H5971><s%> is broken <S%H7665><s%> with a great <S%H1419><s%> breach, <S%H7667><s%> with a very <S%H3966><s%> grievous <S%H2470><s%> blow. <S%H4347><s%>

If <S%H518><s%> I go <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> into the field, <S%H7704><s%> then behold <S%H2009><s%> the slain <S%H2491><s%> with the sword! <S%H2719><s%> and if <S%H518><s%> I enter <S%H935><s%> into the city, <S%H5892><s%> then behold <S%H2009><s%> them that are sick <S%H8463><s%> with famine! <S%H7458><s%> yes, <S%H3588><s%> <S%H1571><s%> both <S%H1571><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%> and the priest <S%H3548><s%> go <S%H5503><s%> about <S%H5503><s%> into <S%H413><s%> a land <S%H776><s%> that they know <S%H3045><s%> not.

Have you utterly rejected <S%H3988><s%> Judah? <S%H3063><s%> has your soul <S%H5315><s%> loathed <S%H1602><s%> Zion? <S%H6726><s%> why <S%H4069><s%> have you smitten <S%H5221><s%> us, and there is no <S%H369><s%> healing <S%H4832><s%> for us? we looked <S%H6960><s%> for peace, <S%H7965><s%> and there is no <S%H369><s%> good; <S%H2896><s%> and for the time <S%H6256><s%> of healing, <S%H4832><s%> and behold <S%H2009><s%> trouble! <S%H1205><s%>
We acknowledge, <S%H3045><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> our wickedness, <S%H7562><s%> and the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of our fathers: <S%H1><s%> for we have sinned <S%H2398><s%> against you.

Do not abhor <S%H5006><s%> us, for your name's <S%H8034><s%> sake, <S%H4616><s%> do not disgrace <S%H5034><s%> the throne <S%H3678><s%> of your glory: <S%H3519><s%> remember, <S%H2142><s%> break <S%H6565><s%> not your covenant <S%H1285><s%> with us.

Are there any among the vanities <S%H1892><s%> of the Gentiles <S%H1471><s%> that can cause rain? <S%H1653><s%> or can the heavens <S%H8064><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> showers? <S%H7241><s%> are not you he, O LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God? <S%H430><s%> therefore we will wait <S%H6960><s%> on you: for you have made <S%H6213><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> things.
